first_para: John Webster Robertson (born 17 April 1952) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Glasgow North West since 2000. Until 2010, he was Parliamentary Private Secretary to Secretary of State for Work and Pensions Yvette Cooper.

full.extract:
John Webster Robertson (born 17 April 1952) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Glasgow North West since 2000. Until 2010, he was Parliamentary Private Secretary to Secretary of State for Work and Pensions Yvette Cooper.
^ "Parliament home page > Parliamentary business > Publications and Records > Hansard > Commons Debates > Daily Hansard - Debate – 19 May 2010 : Column 13". Parliament of the United Kingdom. 19 May 2010. 
^ "About me". John Robertson MP for Glasgow North West. 
^ "Biography". John Robertson MP for Glasgow North West. Archived from the original on 1 February 2010. 
^
full.title: John Robertson (Glasgow politician)
